description: Header file defining the OttPermissionCache class, a thread-safe in-memory cache for permissions associated with OTT services. It provides singleton access and methods to update, retrieve, invalidate, and clear cached permissions, along with utility methods to check presence and cache size.
published: OttPermissionCache::UpdateCache(const string& appId, const std::vector<string>& permissions)

classes.name: OttPermissionCache
classes.description: A singleton class implementing a thread-safe cache for permissions associated with application IDs in OTT services.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Returns a reference to the singleton instance of OttPermissionCache.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves a copy of the permissions vector for a given application ID.

methods.name: UpdateCache
methods.description: Replaces the cached permissions for an application ID with a new list.

methods.name: Invalidate
methods.description: Removes the cached permissions for a specified application ID.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears all entries in the cache.

methods.name: Has
methods.description: Checks if a cache entry exists for a given application ID.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Returns the current number of cached entries.

calls: OttPermissionCache::UpdateCache(const string& appId, const std::vector<string>& permissions)
